title: MOTD analysis: Ilkay Gundogan took centre stage - Alan Shearer
description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer explains how Ilkay Gundogan took "centre stage" after scoring two goals and missing a penalty in Manchester City's 2-1 win over Leeds.

title: Real Madrid 2-1 Osasuna: Rodrygo scores twice as Madrid win Copa del Rey
description: Rodrygo scores twice as Real Madrid win the Copa del Rey for the first time since 2014 after beating Osasuna.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Crowning glory' of 'happy and glorious' Coronation
description: Sunday's front pages focus on the King's "crowning glory" as the world watches the Coronation.

title: Silvio Berlusconi: Italy ex-PM appears by video after serious illness
description: The 86-year-old is still in hospital after suffering from a lung infection linked to his leukaemia.

title: Lauren Price beats Kirstie Bavington in first British Female Welterweight Championship fight
description: Olympic gold medallist Lauren Price beats Kirstie Bavington in the inaugural British Female Welterweight Championship bout in Birmingham.

title: Ukraine war: Evacuation prompts Zaporizhzhia nuclear safety warning
description: The UN watchdog warns of "the threat of a severe nuclear accident" at the Russian-held Zaporizhzhia plant.

title: Miami Grand Prix: Sergio Perez on pole & Max Verstappen ninth as Charles Leclerc crash curtails qualifying
description: Red Bull's Sergio Perez takes pole position for the Miami Grand Prix while team-mate and title rival Max Verstappen will start only ninth.

title: URC: Glasgow 5-14 Munster - Heroic defence sends visitors into semis
description: Munster turn in a steely defensive display to win away at Glasgow Warriors and set up a United Rugby Championship semi-final away to Leinster.

title: Serbia mass shootings: Country reels in the wake of deadly attacks
description: Questions about the country's gun laws are being asked following two separate attacks this week.

title: 'Shearer should be concerned' - Kane closes in on record
description: Only Alan Shearer stands in Harry Kane's way of the Premier League's goalscoring record after the Tottenham striker scores his 209th against Crystal Palace to surpass Wayne Rooney.

title: Liverpool 1-0 Brentford: Mohamed Salah hits winner and rewrites Reds history
description: Mohamed Salah continues his scoring form as Liverpool defeat Brentford to move one point behind Manchester United in the race for the top four.

title: 'This is business' - Guardiola unhappy with Man City penalty despite win
description: Manchester City are four points clear at the top and in control of the Premier League title race, but their manager Pep Guardiola still wasn't happy after his side's win over Leeds.

title: King Charles' Coronation: How people watched a day not seen for 70 years
description: Seventy years after the last coronation, the crowning of King Charles III was a very different spectacle.

title: Manipur violence: Dozens dead as ethic clashes grip Indian state
description: At least 30 people are reported to have been killed in violence over job and opportunity quotas.

title: Police consulted National Crime Agency over SNP probe
description: The BBC understands the force asked the NCA to carry out a peer review of its inquiry last year.

title: Inside the abbey, watching history in the making
description: Surrounded by candlelight and the glow of gold, you could feel the expectation, writes the BBC's Sean Coughlan.

title: Manchester City 2-1 Leeds: Erling Haaland should have taken penalty - Pep Guardiola
description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Erling Haaland should have taken the penalty missed by Ilkay Gundogan as his side held on to beat Leeds 2-1.

title: Bournemouth 1-3 Chelsea: Late goals give Blues first win under Frank Lampard
description: Goals from Benoit Badiashile and Joao Felix give Chelsea their first win since the return of Frank Lampard as interim manager.

title: Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis' big day at the Coronation
description: Prince Louis and Princess Charlotte took a starring role on their grandfather's Coronation day.

title: Man City 2-1 Leeds: Ilkay Gundogan scores twice to send Premier League leaders four points clear
description: Manchester City move four points clear at the top of the Premier League by surviving a late scare against Leeds United.

title: Tottenham Hotspur 1-0 Crystal Palace: Harry Kane scores winner to become Premier League's outright second-highest scorer
description: Tottenham's Harry Kane scores the winner against Crystal Palace and becomes the outright second-highest goalscorer in Premier League history.

title: Laura Kuenssberg: After local election upheaval, what's next for the parties?
description: Thursday's vote was a useful snapshot, showing Labour is well on its way and the Tories are in trouble.

title: How King Charles' Coronation unfolded... in 90 seconds
description: How King Charles' Coronation day unfolded

title: Woman dies falling from mobility scooter
description: Police are investigating after a woman in her 60s fell into the road and died from head injuries.

title: Penny Mordaunt's sword-wielding role - and other top moments
description: An MP holding a sword took a surprising star role, while the royal children shared a tender moment.

title: Sport pays coronation tribute to King Charles III
description: Sporting events play the national anthem in special tribute to mark the coronation of King Charles III.

title: Penny Mordaunt carries sword ahead of King Charles
description: Penny Mordaunt carries sword ahead of King Charles

title: King and Queen wave from Buckingham Palace balcony
description: King Charles and Queen Camilla wave from Buckingham Palace balcony.

title: Thousands join march for Scottish independence
description: The event, organised by All Under One Banner, culminated in a mass rally on Glasgow Green.

title: Ascension Choir sing Alleluia at Coronation
description: King Charles III praised in a new gospel music composition performed in Westminster Abbey.

title: Katy Perry searches for her seat at Coronation
description: The pop star seemed unsure of where she was supposed to be as she arrived at Westminster Abbey.

title: Russian pro-war blogger injured in car bomb
description: Zakhar Prilepin is injured and his driver killed in a car bomb attack in the Nizhny Novgorod region.

title: The outfits Kate and Camilla wore to the coronation
description: Kate's dress is designed by Alexander McQueen, while Camilla is wearing a Bruce Oldfield gown.

title: Prince William kisses the King after oath
description: The Prince of Wales pledges loyalty to his father as the Coronation nears its end.

description: A montage of the most memorable moments from the coronation of King Charles III.

title: Walthamstow pupil's death will be felt for a long time- head teacher
description: Head teacher Sam Jones says his pupil's death was the "darkest of days" for the community.

title: Coronation's most eye-catching guest outfits

title: Watch the moment King Charles III is crowned
description: The Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby places the St Edward's Crown on King Charles's head.

title: WSL: Frida Maanum's 'magnificent' strike keeps Arsenal in WSL title race - highlights
description: Watch highlights as Frida Maanum's "magnificent" second-half strike gives Arsenal a 1-0 victory over Leicester to keep their WSL title hopes alive.

title: Coronation: King Charles arrives at Westminster Abbey
description: King Charles III is greeted by a musical fanfare as he enters Westminster Abbey for his Coronation.

title: Dead fin whale removed from Bridlington beach
description: The 55ft fin whale had become a macabre attraction with people reportedly travelling to see it.

title: Prince Harry arrives at the abbey
description: The Duke of Sussex looked happy and relaxed as he entered the abbey with his cousins Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie, the daughters of Prince Andrew.

title: Prince Harry arrives at abbey for Coronation
description: But the Duke of Sussex is expected to return to the US shortly after the ceremony.

title: King Charles's procession leaves Palace
description: Charles III and the Queen Consort Camilla are accompanied by the King's Procession.

title: Who's who at Westminster Abbey?
description: Guests have been arriving at Westminster Abbey to see the King crowned.

title: Oath of allegiance wording changed for Coronation
description: The Archbishop will 'invite' people to express support for the King, rather than 'call' for allegiance.

title: Guests entertained by music in the Abbey
description: Choirs and soloists keep the Coronation congregation entertained while they await the start of the service.

title: Coronation: Moment protester arrested near Trafalgar Square
description: Protester Matt Turnbull is one of the people arrested in the build up to the Coronation.

title: First glimpse of Charles arriving at Buckingham Palace
description: The King and Queen Consort are driven through the streets of London in the Royal limousine.

title: Anti-monarchy group Republic's chief arrested at Coronation protest
description: Graham Smith, the head of anti-monarchy group Republic, was detained in Trafalgar Square.

title: Watch celebrity guests arrive at Westminster Abbey
description: Famous faces gather for the Coronation service in London.

title: Ukraine war: Russia accused of using phosphorus bombs in Bakhmut
description: Rights groups warn the chemical is "notorious for the severity of the injuries it causes".

title: Celebrities tell BBC how excited they are
description: Ant and Dec are among the celebrity guests arriving at Westminster Abbey for the Coronation.

title: Wrexham: Can football fame make City of Culture vulture?
description: Backers who want Wrexham to win City of Culture status hope football success will boost the bid.

title: King Charles' Coronation Oath Bible will contain mistakes
description: A special King James edition of the book has been edited to be as close to a 1611 text as possible.

title: Habib Chaab: Iran executes Swedish-Iranian for alleged terrorism
description: Habib Chaab was a founder of a group calling for independence for ethnic Arabs in Khuzestan province.

title: In pictures: The King's coronation
description: Photos of King Charles III's Coronation, the first to take place in the UK in 70 years.

title: Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez v John Ryder: Predictions for title fight
description: BBC Sport rounds up predictions from the boxing world as Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez defends his undisputed super-middleweight titles against Briton John Ryder.

title: Watch: Coronation troops march through Waterloo
description: Thousands of soldiers, sailors and airmen will all be taking part in today's Coronation.

title: Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez v John Ryder: Mexican champion sends fans into frenzy at weigh-in
description: Saul 'Canelo Alvarez is cheered on by thousands of fans at a spectacular weigh-in before his title fight with Britain's John Ryder in Guadalajara.

title: Sudan fighting: Warring sides set for Saudi Arabia talks
description: A US-Saudi statement welcomes the first Sudanese face-to-face negotiations to end weeks of fighting.

title: Mexico claims proof of Chinese fentanyl smuggling
description: President López Obrador says he wants China to help fight the deadly opioid ravaging the US.

title: Daniel Penny: Ex-Marine defends NYC subway chokehold
description: Lawyers for Daniel Penny say he and other passengers acted in self-defence when they restrained Jordan Neely.
